title: What is BSR on Amazon? [Best Sellers Rank]

tactics.name: BSR Analysis for Product Research
tactics.description: Use BSR to evaluate product competitiveness and identify top sellers by analyzing rank positions and review counts.
steps: Use Chrome extensions like Helium 10 or DS Quickview to populate BSR data on search results
Compare BSR rankings across timeframes to track sales velocity
Prioritize products with high review counts and lower BSR numbers
caveats: Suppression issues cause blank BSR entries requiring immediate action
source_quotes: this is a great technique to use during product research because you can tell what is the top seller

tactics.name: Monitor BSR and Adjust Category
tactics.description: Track BSR performance and switch categories if sales are stagnant.
steps: Check BSR for blank or low rankings
Request category change via Brand Registry
caveats: Category changes may not immediately boost sales
source_quotes: BSRs are not equal they are different based on the category they are in

tactics.name: bsr_algorithm
tactics.description: Understanding BSR factors beyond unit sales
source_quotes: it's a combination factor of a bunch of things including that ctr conversion rate unit count and profit

heuristics.name: Review Count Threshold Heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting product visibility
source_quotes: the ones with high reviews also are pretty good signal and indication

heuristics.name: Category Impact Threshold
heuristics.condition: If BSR is above 50,000, category impact on sales is minimal
source_quotes: if you're in like the hundreds and it wouldn't matter which category you're in

heuristics.name: review_threshold
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews less than 200 then boost
source_quotes: it's a combination factor of a bunch of things including that ctr conversion rate unit count and profit

claims.statement: BSR rankings exhibit exponential differences in sales velocity
source_quotes: the closer you get to the top of the bsr those lower numbers the more exponential the cell's velocity becomes
home goods versus 100 000 in grocery without a doubt the home goods one is moving significantly faster

claims.statement: BSR considers conversion rates and profit alongside sales volume
source_quotes: it's not purely based on just units being turned

niche_patterns.example: gift boxes for women + low BSR + high competition
niche_patterns.description: Identify niches where products face exponential sales velocity challenges despite low BSR rankings
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Highlights the need for targeted pricing and SEO optimization in highly competitive categories
source_quotes: the difference between say 50 000 and twenty five thousand totally different

niche_patterns.example: skincare set + stagnant sales + misclassified category
niche_patterns.description: Products in low-performing categories struggle to gain BSR traction
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Category-specific BSR dynamics create competitive advantages
source_quotes: my item is not doing well at all in its current category
